title: 请大神看看，没进界面就崩了
author: ljp374961061
txt_content:
---- Minecraft Crash Report ----
// Don't do that.

Time: 17-11-26 下午10:03
Description: Initializing game

java.lang.RuntimeException: Shaders Mod detected. Please remove it, OptiFine has built-in support for shaders.

        at net.minecraft.launchwrapper.Launch.main(Launch.java:28)

replies.author: 破损的鞘翅
replies.txt_content:
第一张图，你找找ShadersModCore，那就是光影核心mod
第二张图可以看到你有装Optifine
删掉ShadersModCore

replies.author: gooding300
replies.txt_content:
Optifine和Shader Mod不能同时安装
前者为高清修复 后者为光影，请自行删除后者（前者已带有后者功能）

replies.author: ljp374961061
replies.txt_content: 两百多个模组，超级难找
